game.name: Train Simulator: Hope Valley Line: Manchester - Sheffield
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Travel to the heart of the Peak District in Train Simulator Classic and explore the picturesque Hope Valley Line from Just Trains.
